headline: Americans aren't drinking anymore. Alcohol giants are scrambling to manage the fallout.
summary: Survey results show Americans are drinking less and less. As volumes drop off, alcohol giants are being forced to adapt.

raw.headline: Americans aren't drinking anymore. Alcohol giants are scrambling to manage the fallout.
raw.summary: Survey results show Americans are drinking less and less. As volumes drop off, alcohol giants are being forced to adapt.

headline: Philip Morris: Priced For Perfection With Underwhelming Dividends
summary: Philip Morris shows strong smoke-free growth and raised FY2025 guidance, but high valuation and rising competition add risk. Find out why PM stock is a hold.

raw.headline: Philip Morris: Priced For Perfection With Underwhelming Dividends
